original_title: Sri Lanka to open WTC campaign against Pakistan
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka will open their 2023-2025 World Test Championship campaign against Pakistan, in a two Test home series.
The first Test will be played from July 16 to 20 in Galle, while the second Test will be from July 24 to 28 at the SSC.
50 years of Cricket World Cup: ICC celebrates landmark feat in the history of cricket
